Best human biology lecture that makes sense for me.

Hello, Mr. Hopper. My reason for watching your series is that I want to advance my knowledge in the medical field. I already have a Bachelor of Science degree in Sociology.  I do not intend to get a M.D. currently, but simply wish to expand my knowledge. My family is in the medical field, and I want to learn what I can to help people with said knowledge. Do you offer any of the following courses, or can you recommend some professor's courses to me?  What I'm looking for: -General and Organic Chemistry -Physics -Psychology -Calculus -Anatomy and Physiology  Could you also tell me the name of the textbook your class uses?  Thanks for any help.
Happy I found this video! Definitely want to learn about the body. Hope I learn a lot!

Mr. Hopper, I’m taking Human Biology online through a college in Arizona. Your videos are amazing and have really helped me get through class and understand concepts. Your voice and demeanor is entertaining and keeps me awake and yearning for more education. I appreciate you leaving these videos up online for others not truly in your class to learn this topic. I wish you were my instructor. Your students were lucky to have you.
thank you

Learn how to use past tense, and the difference between getting and giving. I am being sarcastic...... The class teaches what it needs to.

Hi there.  This class is taught online through Shelton State Community College.

Glad you're enjoying it.  Are you taking a Human Bio class?

Never.  I tell people all the time... its very helpful to have a little grasp of the world around them on a day to day basis... if nothing else just so you can understand what a doctor is telling you... or at best, keep from having to go to the doctor at all!  :)
